name: Farm Way Clicker
description:
Are you ready for the fastest fingers competition? But beware - you will sweat like a pig and work like a dog!

Let the adventure begin!

• The pig is so fat. He has to work out to lose its weight. If you are fast enough, the sausages will fly all over the place. Keep your eyes peeled for golden sausage and flying bacon.
• Yuck, can you smell this? The horse has a smelly problem with flies. Hit them all before the time runs out.
• The rabbit loves carrots. Pull those tasty carrots out of the soil as quickly as you can!
• Do you know how to milk a cow by hand? Try it. You can then enjoy even the chocolate-flavoured milk.
• Help the hen to lay eggs. You have to tap on it as fast as you can to get as many eggs as possible. Watch out for a special coloured Easter egg.
• Poor dog, its fur looks terrible! Tap all those annoying fleas away with your finger.
• Bees collect pollen and make honey when most flowers are in bloom. Pay special attention to bear's paw and carnivorous plants.
• The sheep needs a shave. Shear the sheep to get the wool.

You can compete with your family and friends, as well as compare your high scores through global leaderboard.

Features:
• beautiful high quality HD graphics
• intuitive, easy to use interface
• easy and fun to play but hard to master
• compete with friends
• try to get medals
